<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/user/info/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves user information based on the provided authorization token.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"statusCode":200,"message":"User found","error":null,"data":{"id":"user_id","username":"username","email":"user@example.com"}}}}}}},"403":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"unauthorized":{"value":{"statusCode":403,"message":"Invalid token","error":"Unauthorized"}}}}}},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"notFound":{"value":{"statusCode":404,"message":"User not found","error":"Not found"}}}}}},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"serverError":{"value":{"statusCode":500,"message":"Internal server error","error":"Internal server error"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
